data.comment: The match is underway in Brest.
Throw-in Lille.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Lille to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Romain Faivre (Brestois) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 6, In Brest Lille attack through Renato Sanches. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
In the minute 8, Brestois are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Brestois close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Brestois.
In the minute 10, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Lille push forward at Stade Francis-Le Ble and Burak Yilmaz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brestois defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
In the minute 13, Florent Batta awards Lille a goal kick.
Brestois have a goal kick.
Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Goal! Ronael Pierre-Gabriel heads Brestois into a 1-0 lead.
Romain Perraud with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Brestois.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
Romain Perraud puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 19, That's a fine assist from Franck Honorat.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Lille.
Florent Batta signals a Lille throw-in in Brestois's half.
At Stade Francis-Le Ble, Lille are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 24, Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 26, Florent Batta signals a Lille throw-in in Brestois's half.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Brestois.
In the minute 29, Brestois drives forward and Romain Perraud gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Brestois's Irvin Cardona is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille drive forward but Botman Sven is judged offside.
Florent Batta awards Lille a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lille just outside Brestois's area.
In the minute 38, Burak Yilmaz (Lille) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
In the minute 42, Brestois move into a more comfortable 3-0 lead. Irvin Cardona is the scorer with a header!
Steve Mounie instrumental with a fine assist.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Lille's Jonathan Ikone gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Brestois defender.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Florent Batta will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lille have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
An attacking Lille player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
The first-half is over.
Burak Yilmaz's penalty pulls one back for Lille at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 45, Burak Yilmaz (Lille) gets a yellow card.
The second half has started at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Boubakary Soumare with Xeka.
Reinildo Mandava is on a sub for Domagoj Bradaric for Lille.
Lille make their third substitution with Isaac Lihadji replacing Jonathan Ikone.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Lille.
Jose Fonte (Lille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brestois's half?
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Brestois.
Yusuf Yazici of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Free kick Lille.
Brendan Chardonnet (Brestois) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 53, Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
Florent Batta awards Brestois a goal kick.
Florent Batta signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Brestois's area.
In the minute 55, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Steve Mounie for Brestois has been booked by Florent Batta and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 57, Lille are back in the match in Brest. Burak Yilmaz has scored to make it 3-2.
Great play from Yusuf Yazici to set up the goal.
In Brest Lille's Renato Sanches is caught offside.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille pushes forward through Isaac Lihadji, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 61, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brestois awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Reinildo Mandava (Lille) has received a yellow card from Florent Batta.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 65, Brestois's Jean-Kevin Duverne misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Jonathan David is replacing Yusuf Yazici for the away team.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a Lille throw-in in Brestois's half.
In the minute 68, Lille have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Throw-in high up the field for Lille in Brest.
In Brest, Isaac Lihadji (Lille) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Important block from the Brestois defence as Jonathan Bamba fires in a strike for Lille.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
In the minute 73, Brestois have a goal kick.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Brestois.
In the minute 76, Burak Yilmaz for Lille drives towards goal at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a fifth substitution, with Tim Weah replacing Jeremy Pied.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz has run offside.
Oliver Dall'Oglio is making the team's first substitution at Stade Francis-Le Ble with Jeremy Le Douaron replacing Irvin Cardona.
In the minute 78, Gaetan Charbonnier is on a sub for Steve Mounie for Brestois.
Brestois's Ronael Pierre-Gabriel breaks free at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
In the minute 80, Ronael Pierre-Gabriel is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brestois have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Brestoisâ€™s Ronael Pierre-Gabriel is on his feet again at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Cristian Battocchio is replacing Franck Honorat for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Burak Yilmaz of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Lille to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In the minute 85, Florent Batta awards Brestois a goal kick.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 87, Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
At Stade Francis-Le Ble, Gautier Larsonneur has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 89, Tim Weah (Lille) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
Lille are on the attack at Stade Francis-Le Ble, where Burak Yilmaz is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Brestois needs to be cautious. Lille have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Florent Batta signals a Lille throw-in in Brestois's half.
In Brest, Lille push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
Lille's Jose Fonte has been booked in Brest.
